mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_hotgoods (hotgoods_code, sort_no, sku_no, is_deleted, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, version) values (#{hotGoodsCode}, #{sortNo}, #{skuNo}, #{isDeleted}, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{lastModifiedBy}, 0)
mapper.select:
select a.sku_no skuNo, a.sku_name skuName, a.sku_state skuState , b.cate_name_parent cateParentName, b.cate_name cateSonName, a.version version from t_sys_goods a,t_sys_classification b where a.cate_code = b.cate_code and a.is_deleted = 0 and a.sku_state = 1
and a.sku_name like concat('%', #{skuName}, '%')
and a.sku_No like concat('%', #{skuNo}, '%')
order by a.create_time desc

select a.hotgoods_code hotGoodsCode, a.sort_no sortNo, a.sku_no skuNo, b.sku_name skuName, b.selling_price sellingPrice, b.detail detail from t_sys_hotgoods a,t_sys_goods b where a.sku_no = b.sku_no and a.is_deleted = 0
and b.sku_name like concat('%', #{skuName}, '%')
and a.sku_no like concat('%', #{skuNo}, '%')
order by a.sort_no ASC
mapper.update: update t_sys_hotgoods set sort_no = #{sortNo}, sku_no = #{skuNo}, update_time = now(), update_user = #{lastModifiedBy}, version = version + 1 where hotgoods_code = #{hotGoodsCode} and version = #{version}
